note.p: Education: Harrow School; Trinity College, Cambridge. SCL

Member of PArliament for Cambridge 1847-52 and 1854-57. Jog Sheriff of County Antrim 1853. Lietenant Colonel East Suffolk Militia Artillery 1853-81 and Hon. Colonel therof 1881-1886; Military ADC to the Queen, wi the rank of Colonel 1857-86. Succedded his father 24 February 1869 as the second Baronet and was created Baron Waveney 10 April 1873; Lord Lieutenant Co. Antrim 1883-86; Hon. Col. 4th Battalion, Royal Irish Rifles; Chairman, Ipswich Quarter Session.
Claimed to have been nitiated a Freemason in 1828
